meta.description: Determine the number of small and large branches to build to minimize the total number of branches while meeting customer service and teller constraints.

sets.name: BRANCH_TYPES
sets.description: Types of branches that can be built

params.name: customers_per_branch
params.description: Number of customers each branch type can serve per day

params.name: tellers_per_branch
params.description: Number of tellers required for each branch type

params.name: total_tellers_available
params.description: Total number of bank tellers available

params.name: total_customers_needed
params.description: Total number of customers that need to be served per day

vars.name: branches
vars.description: Number of branches to build of each type

objective.name: min_total_branches
objective.description: Minimize the total number of branches built

constraints.name: teller_constraint
constraints.description: Total number of tellers used by branches must not exceed available tellers

constraints.name: customer_service_constraint
constraints.description: Total number of customers served by branches must meet or exceed the required number
